attributes.action: Abolish - or raise the threshold of - the ludicrous and immoral 3% Stamp Duty on properties over £250,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Seriously, this is wrong. This was designed to penalise the wealthy but now hits, for example, first time buyers of a one-bed flat in London! That's a minimum of £7,500 in stamp duty. This is an horrendous amount of money just for the 'privilege' of relocating. It does not reflect the state of the property market at all. It is scandalous.
